name: Aerial Playground
description:
Inspired by ancient yogic traditions, Airo Yoga takes flight for the modern explorer. Emerging in the 2000s, it reimagines classic poses with the playful freedom of a custom-designed aerial hammock.
Airo Yoga, a specific style within Aerial Yoga, incorporates the flowing sequences of Vinyasa yoga, the core control of Pilates, the thrill of inversions, and the playful connection of acro play. The result creates a truly exhilarating and accessible practice that uses Eastern philosophies to offer a unique path to strength, mindfulness, and a joyful flight for all.

name: Wonders of Horology
description:
Delve into the enchanting world of watchmaking, and gain a deeper understanding about the stellar craftsmanship and intricate detailing that go into the making of luxe time pieces.
This experience will have you discover the nuanced art and science of watch-making, and help you look at time from a whole new perspective under the guidance of an expert horologist.
The experience includes navigating through various components of Time Making, the intricacies of Fine Watchmaking in an immersive visual journey under the guidance of an expert.

name: Treasures From The Estates
description:
Switch from coffee enthusiast to aficionado in this unique coffee appreciation experience. Delve into the world of premium Indian Estate Coffees, and learn the nuances of brewing and tasting single-origin brews, including a cold one.
This immersive experience helps you develop a keen sense of understanding about unique Indian coffees and what makes them special. We will cover three brewing methods - AeroPress, FrenchPress and Pour Over.
Join us for the Brunch edit. Enjoy Trove’s signature coffee brewing experience alongside a special breakfast menu curated by Chef Ashley of Monkey Bar.
Attendees can opt for either a vegetarian or non-vegetarian set breakfast menu, which will include all items mentioned below.


Veg Meal: Chole Bhature, Mini Fruit Bowl, and Mini Muffin.

Non Veg Meal: Mushroom & Cheese Omelette (with a slice of bread, butter & side salad), Mini Muesli Bowl, and Mini Muffin.

Fresh watermelon juice will be served to all attendees.

name: Echoes of Calm
description:
The use of sound for healing dates back thousands of years to various ancient cultures. Indigenous peoples have long used drums, chanting, and other instruments for ceremonial and therapeutic purposes. These practices were often tied to spiritual rituals and were believed to have healing properties.
This immersive sound bath experience is built on the enduring belief in the power of sound, and sets you on the path to healing, relaxation, and spiritual growth.

name: Hula Harmony
description:
A toy that was once designed for recreation, hula hooping gradually took the world by a storm, starting with the United States in the late 1950s. Today hula hooping is not just a playful activity, but also a form of exercise and artistic expression. A cultural phenomenon, influencing music, fashion, and dance.
This experience will involve a guided introduction to hula hooping, tricks and transitions and flow choreography through some fun activities!
location: Good Move Studios & Dance Academy, Koramangala, Bangalore

name: The Craft of Mixology
description:
Discover the world of cocktails and spirits and learn how to balance your own cocktail concoction under the guidance of expert mixologists.
The experience will include a quick introduction to different spirits, cocktail making techniques, bar equipment, interesting garnishing tips along with various stories and myths around cocktails and spirits.

name: Gourmet Cookalong
description:
Drawing inspiration from community dining and the pleasures of deep diving into the art of cooking and dining well, this experience helps you engage all five senses when you're in the kitchen. The caviar on the top is relishing a wonderful meal that you, along with a bunch of people, will cook together.The theme for this cookalong is Japanese cuisine - Sushi making. 


The cookalong:


Observe: Our expert will demonstrate how to roll three types of sushi from scratch: Maki, uramaki, and temaki sushi.
Make Your Own Sushi: Learn to make four types of sushi from scratch using various fillings and rolling styles, as demonstrated by the chef and savour them.
Note: The cookalong and the meal will include both vegetarian (exotic vegetables and yasai vegetables) and non-vegetarian (salmon and crab) options.

Additionally, all guests will be served asparagus tempura and pickled vegetables.
